experience: You and Chris both know Anila Arthanari, Justin Williams, and 32 others
Globaltranz's Brandon Copeland  speaking during the Rateview advanced Lab  yesterday #datuc2017

So today was pretty interesting.  Got my podium delivered yesterday so took some time this morning to assemble it for today's class.  I feel so much better giving my lectures from an actual lectern.  Sitting down behind a roll away desk just felt like I was being lazy.

Also, I've equipped the room with a wireless IP camera so now the camera we use can go anywhere!  That combined with the Yeti mic makes the whole thing feel so much more professional.  Additionally I got the wireless wifi HDMI adapter working on the projector so the whole setup is pretty amazing.

The new Coding From Scratch curriculum offered by Coder Camps is much better and gives good material to talk about in class.  The exercises come at good times so I can measure out my days by when we get to those exercises.  They also throw in a few wrenches to keep people on their toes, forcing them to learn through research.
Good things are happening here at the Redmond WA campus!  9 students in this class, and hopefully more in the next!

HealthTrio is a leading Software-as-a-Service provider for the healthcare market, enabling health plans to achieve the triple aim of better care, better outcomes and lower cost within a rapidly transforming industry. HealthTrio offers a series of low-risk, modular solutions that can be combined for a complete technology suite or used independently to complement existing systems. These solutions draw together systems and stakeholders to take action in support of healthier outcomes.Led the software engineering teams responsible for the HealthTrio Connect™ and Smart Exchange™ product lines, supporting over 5 million lives.

MindPlay's 31 year history has been dedicated to changing lives through improving literacy rates in struggling readers.  MindPlay committed to providing k-12 students with the skills they need to be successful readers regardless of their environment.  The Virtual Reading Coach™ product suite offers direct explicit instruction in an engaging format.Responsible for sales management and strategic partnerships both domestic and international.
Built and led the development team behind MindPlay Virtual Reading Coach. Responsibilities included leadership of: Software Development, Quality Assurance and Customer Service teams.

September 8, 2016, Matthew reported directly to Chris

Chris is a strong and vibrant leader. He excels in helping those under him succeed by skillfully directing where effort is most critical and removing any roadblocks that might stand in the way of his team succeeding. He brings the energy without the ego. He is just as invested in the ideas of those he leads as he is in his own, and does an excellent job at ensuring that those under his leadership are encouraged and valued. He would be an excellent addition to any senior leadership team.

Chris is a high-energy charismatic leader and it is no surprise that he has graduated to the "C" leagues.  He has a strategic view of development and manpower, but isn't afraid to wade in and roll up his sleeves when a project starts to falter. August 29, 2016, Jason reported directly to Chris

I worked under Chris for almost a year, and was impressed by his personality, drive, and ambition. His door was always open, and I knew I could talk to him about anything that was on my mind. He knew which battles were worth fighting, and which battles would be a waste of time and energy. He also knew when to step back and let a project run itself, as well as when to step in and make his presence known, changing the course of the project for the better.Any company would be lucky to have someone like Chris in charge of their engineers, and I wouldn't hesitate to work for him again.
